About Me

Hi, my name is Ming and I am a data engineer/data scientist with an engineering background. Despite starting with limited coding experience, I have single handedly built full-stack web applications. My greatest strength is my ability to grasp complex concept quickly and learn independently.

I am highly skilled in : R

I am moderately skilled in : Python , SQL , JavaScript , HTML , CSS

Frameworks that I am learning : React , Express , Material UI

Projects

Sensor state monitoring app

A bespoke big data web app that won me an invididual award

Functions as a proactive monitoring tool for safety instrument systems in a production facility in Australia. The underlying model is the use of a statistical method called CuSUM.

The back-end requirement demands on-the-fly ingesting and transformation of data to evaluate the latest state of those systems. The front-end requirement calls for a UI that spans multiple pages and have interactivity with the back-end to add or modify algorithm parameters.

The challenge was to design a pipeline that meets the scope and scale with big data.

The product moved from concept to MVP in 3 months in a team comprising just myself as the developer and a product owner.

The pace, output quality and the variety of technology stack applied has earned me the Rising Star in AI individual award in the internal Shell.AI awards competition. This project is also featured in the annual Shell.AI magazine.

Azure Streaming Analytics - Used for ingesting streaming data
Azure Functions - Used for computing at scale
R - Used for building the front-end interface
Azure SQL - Database

Sand surveillance app

A bespoke web app that utilises Spark Structured Streaming for on-the-fly analytics

Functions as a live surveillance tool for sand production in a large offshore facility in the Gulf of Mexico. The requirement demands on-the-fly ingesting, processing and calculation with latency of no more than a minute.

This was solved using Spark Structured Streaming API to create a pipeline that ingests streaming data, transforms, apply and push to the database continuously.

I was the only developer in this project

DataBricks - Used for on-the-fly data processing at scale
Azure Data Lake - Used for storing delta lake tables
R - Used for building the front-end interface
MongoDB - Database

Gas sales trading app

A bespoke web app that implements grid search algorithm

The app functions as a tool to generate optimal trading transactions based on a given multitude of boundary conditions. The requirement demands an algorithm that handles many edge cases and captures the complex business logic.

This project was shortlisted in the the internal Shell.AI awards competition for a project award but failed to secure a win.

R - Used for building the back-end and front-end
Azure SQL - Database

My own perception about myself as a person

  • Introvert who is only ever comfortable in non-small talks. Weak in formal talks.
  • Hardworking who willingly put effort as long as it interests me
  • Direct who does not like to sacrifice clarity for the sake of politeness
  • Calculative who overthinks with the intention to make the most of every situation
  • Single minded who is stubborn to absorb other people’s views if not reasonably grounded
  • Impatient who is eager to get things done fast
  • Efficiency is king who dislike bureaucratic processes
